content.question: The events shown on the maps best illustrate which of the following principles of international diplomacy in early modern Europe?

choices.label: Maintenance of the balance of power
Rulers’ ability to determine their states’ official religion
Dynastic marriage to establish political alliances

content.answer: Maintenance of the balance of power

topic.text: 4.6: Enlightened and Other Approaches to Power
